original_title: Newsline | Survival in a crashing economy | Prof. Anil Jayantha | 13th July 2023
original_body_lines: Newsline | Survival in a crashing economy | Prof. Anil Jayantha | 13th July 2023
President to hold meeting with Tamil parlimentarians in the North-Eastern provinces
Feasibility study commences for relocating administrative buildings to Sri Jayawardenepura Kotte
